Author: Ottermandias
Name: Accountant
Description: 집사, 비공정, 잠수함, 일일/주간 복권 등 타이머를 표시해주는 플러그인입니다.

Author: yomishino
Name: ActionEffectRange
Description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.
Changelog:
v2.0 new features & updates: 
 - Effect range for automatically triggered actions, such as heals from Earthly Star when the status effect expires 
 - Effect range for summoned pets/companions in addition to ACN/SMN/SCH pets, such as DRK's Esteem and MCH's Autoturret (PvP) 
 - Improved implementation and other bug fixes

Author: UnknownX
Name: A Realm Recorded
Description: Adds additional features to the duty recorder and automatically starts it in most instances.
Punchline: Allows you to use the duty recorder

Author: LeonBlade
Name: Burning Down the House
Description: 하우징 아이템들을 위치 제약에 상관없이 설치해보세요.

Author: Mienna
Name: Beachcomber
Description:
This solver examines your Island Sanctuary data (including your Isleventory!) to provide recommendations to maximize your Seafarer's Cowrie earnings.

Made in collaboration with the Overseas Casuals.
Punchline: Determines the most profitable agenda for your Island Sanctuary workshop each cycle

Author: d87
Name: BigPlayerDebuffs
Description: 대상에게 건 디버프를 크게 보여줍니다.

Author: Asgard
Name: Brio
Description: Control actors during GPose sessions.

Author: Styr1x
Name: Browsingway
Description:
Renders browser overlays in-game to enable playing in fullscreen (and G-SYNC) while having access to ACT overlays.
Use the settings button below or the '/bw config' command to configure.
Based on the BrowserHost plugin by ackwell.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Character Panel Refined
Description: Character Panel Refined cuts away useless information from the character panel, while adding useful stats like critical hit and direct hit percentages as well as estimates damage output to allow for easier comparison of gear.
Punchline: 캐릭터 정보를 상세화 하여 치명타 및 직격과 같은 유용한 정보를 표시합니다.

Author: Haplo064, Khayle
Name: Chat Bubbles
Description: 말풍선으로 누가 어떤 이야기를 하는지 보다 자연스럽게 확인할 수 있습니다.

Author: kij
Name: ChatCoordinates
Description:
Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.
Opens map with given coordinates for current or given zone.
See "/coord" for configuration and usage info.

Author: Anna
Name: Chat 2
Description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin. It
supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)
Punchline: 인게임 채팅창을 좀 더 깔끔한 창으로 바꿔주는 플러그인

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Chill Frames
Description:
전투시 중이 아닌 경우 프레임을 낮춰줍니다.

/pcf help → 사용 가능한 모든 명령어
Punchline: 전투시 중이 아닌 경우 프레임을 낮춰줍니다.

Author: XIV Tools
Name: Customize+
Punchline: Customize your character beyond FFXIV's limitations.
Description: A plugin that allows you to create and apply Anamnesis-style body scaling full time.

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Daily Duty
Description:
Automatically track and complete many daily and weekly tasks.

/dd help → Display all available commands

Author: goat, modded by Franz
Name: Discord Chat Bridge
Description: 이 플러그인은 인게임 채팅을 디스코드로 받을 수 있게 해줍니다.
Changelog:
Adds a bandaid for Discord's new username changes. Remember to thank Discord for removing discrimination from their platform. The bot also always accepted user ID numbers, but now it's explicitly mentioned in the setup window.'.

Adds the following new commands:
- xl!toggledefaultnameavatar - Switches webhook mode to use a generic bot username and avatar so messages stack. Should be combined with xl!togglesender or you will have no idea who said what.

Author: goat
Name: Ultrawide Cutscenes
Description:
This plugin removes the "letterboxing" bars when watching cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.
Beware! You may see things that you are not supposed to be seeing, such as upcoming NPCs popping in or T-posing.

Thanks to aers for finding this.

Author: goat
Name: Fancy Loading Screens
Description:
This plugin shows the destination zone's concept art while loading.
NOTE: ONLY LOOKS RIGHT ON 16:9 SCREENS! The concept art is not any bigger, and we can't expand/fix it. Sorry!
Punchline: Shows the destination zone's concept art while loading

Author: goat
Name: Discord Rich Presence
Description: 이 플러그인은 당신의 위치, 직업, 레벨, 이름, 그리고 서버를 디스코드 상태에 표시해줍니다.
Punchline: 디스코드 상태로 당신의 게임 정보를 표시하세요.

Author: perchbird
Name: Damage Info
Description: Configurable options for in-game fly text color based on damage type, with additional settings for damage source and fly text decluttering options.
Punchline: 보다 많은(또는 적은) 인게임 데미지 정보를 표시해줍니다.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Death Recap
Description:
Quickly figure out what killed you or your party members!

Shows:
- Healing
- Damage taken
- Debuffs
- Buffs
- Barriers
- Addle, Feint, Reprisal on damage source

Author: WildWolf
Name: DeepDungeonDex
Description:
A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon.
Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics.
Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played.
Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data.
Original by Strati

Author: Tischel
Name: DelvUI
Description: DelvUI provides a highly configurable HUD replacement and is highly inspired by ElvUI from WoW
Punchline: A modern HUD replacement built for customization.

Author: Jessidhia
Name: DeviceChangeFix
Description:
Stops controller input from freezing randomly by ensuring FFXIV only polls for controllers when one is actually connected or disconnected.

Original plugin by PGGB, icon from Mutant Standard.
Punchline: Stops controller input from freezing randomly.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Distance
Description:
Displays the distance in yalms to your target and/or other enemies, players, NPCs, etc.  It can also display the aggro range for supported bosses.
Please note that this plugin automatically downloads updates for aggro data by default.  This can be disabled in the plugin settings if you wish.

Author: Felys
Name: EnemyListDebuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on the enemy list. Original implementation credit to aers.

Author: Xorus
Name: EngageTimer
Description:
Finally, display all the numbers when starting a countdown!
Comes with an accurate pull timer that starts when you or any of your party members enter combat.

Features :
- Big countdown that displays all the numbers
- Customizable big-number textures (default, yellow, WoW style or custom files)
- Display combat time in the Server Info Bar, and/or a floating window
- OBS browser-source compatible page with countdown and current combat duration

Why the OBS thing ? Well, it can be useful if you want a big stylized stopwatch in your recordings.
See repository for more info.

Feel free so send me feedback, bugs and potential improvements!
Punchline: Complete combat countdown, pull timer and OBS overlay
Changelog:
- Floating Window: option to change the countdown color when casting a spell that will result in a pre-pull.
- Floating Window: uses the global font-scale, you might need to adjust the font size after the update.
- Settings: support for closing the settings window with Escape (WindowSystem features)

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: EnemyListHP (former EnmityHp)
Description: Displays enemies hp in enemy list. Just does that, nothing else.

Author: Critical-Impact
Name: Fantasy Player
Description:
Control Spotify playback from within FFX|V
Use the button below to open settings or use the '/pfp settings' command.
Originally by BiscuitUmU
Punchline: Like you'd ever be sick of the in game music right?

Author: daemitus
Name: ezFauxHollows
Description: This plugin highlights tiles in Faux Hollows that represent the best potential action you can take.

Author: Caraxi
Name: FPS Plugin
Description: Display game FPS. It really is that simple.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: GatherBuddy
Description:
Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations
via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions.

Author: Chivalrik
Name: GentleTouch
Description:
You need to configure patterns and triggers before it will work, 
open the configuration window to do that.  

For DualSense/Shock4 support, the controller needs to be connected wired (same as the game's)
and there can only be one of a type connected (e.g., only one DualSense, not two).

Currently supported triggers are:
- Cooldowns
- Near Aether Current

Author: Anna
Name: Glamaholic
Description: 하는 만큼의 투영 세트를 저장하세요. 20개 이상 저장할 수 있습니다. export와 import 지원.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: Glamourer
Description: Adds functionality to change and store appearance of players, customization and equip. Requires Penumbra to be installed and activated to work. Can also add preview options to the Changed Items tab for Penumbra.

Author: Anna
Name: Globetrotter
Description:
Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.

Icon: Map by Adrien Coquet from the Noun Project

Author: LeonBlade
Name: Heels Plugin
Description: Offsets your character off the ground for when wearing heels.

Author: Kirrana
Name: High FPS Physics Fix
Description:
Causes the game's physics to work at higher FPS by making it update every few frames. 
Toggle with '/physics t', or use on/off instead of t. 
May cause excessive jiggling at lower FPS values. 
Disabling the entire plugin after turning on/off with /physics requires reboot to reenable.
Punchline: Reduces the refresh rate of movement physics, "fixing" it at high fps.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: HP Difference Gauge
Description: Provides a visual representation of the HP difference between two enemies on your aggro list.  Open the plugin config window to see a preview of the gauge and to change options.

Author: Infi
Name: Hunty
Description:
Never has it been that easy to finish your hunting log. 

+ List of monsters in the same location based on Rank
+ Clickable coords to open your map on that exact location
+ Clickable dungeon name to open your duty finder
+ Easy to switch between Grand Company and Jobs
+ Automatic selection based on current job

Author: Tischel
Name: Inventory Search Bar
Description:
Supports different types of filters to be able to find items by name, type, supported job or level requirements.

Supported Inventories:
	- Character Inventory
	- Chocobo Saddlebags
	- Retainer Inventory
	- Armoury

Author: Critical_Impact
Name: Allagan Tools
Description:
Allagan Tool's primary purpose is to keep track of items across your characters/retainers/free company. With it's filter system you'll never lose track of items or not know where they should be sorted.

While this is it's primary purpose, it has quite an exhaustive list of other features including:
	- Craft planning
	- Market board integration
	- Item highlighting in inventories when searching/sorting and picking ingredients for crafts
	- Item window that includes vendor and source information among other things
	- Duty/mob/airship/submarine windows that are fully searchable
	- A filtering system that lets you setup complex searches for specific items 
	- Tooltip integration that'll let you see where the items are on hover
Punchline: Get organized in FFXIV, easily locate/show where to sort items, plan your crafting, and search for mobs, duties, airships, and submarines!

Author: electr0sheep
Name: Item Vendor Location
Description: Adds a context menu option for items that will show you where to find items you can buy off a vendor
Changelog:
- Added Chinese localization (Nuko)
- Fix for some Aenc Ose shop data (Nuko)
- Removed Garland Tools
- GC bug fixes
- Add keybinding modifier option

Author: ocealot
Name: JobBars
Description: Additional job gauges, party buff timers, mitigation trackers, and more. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Chirp
Name: Ktisis
Description: A robust posing tool for creating screenshots in GPose.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Macro Chain
Description:
매크로의 마지막 줄에 '/nextmacro'를 넣어서 다음 매크로가 이어서 실행되게 합니다.
1번 매크로의 마지막 줄에 '/nextmacro' 를 입력해두면, 자동으로 2번 매크로가 실행됩니다.
1번 매크로의 마지막 줄에 '/nextmacro down' 를 입력해두면 자동으로 11번 매크로가 실행됩니다.
또한, 채팅창에 '/runmacro' 를 입력하면 그 매크로를 실행해주지만, 매크로 내에서 사용할 수는 없습니다.

Author: Jawslouis
Name: MakePlace Plugin
Description: Automatically save & load interior and exterior house layouts. Import/export layouts from the MakePlace program.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MapLinker
Description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Mappy
Description: Replaces the ingame map with an ImGui implementation with several additional features.

Author: fmauNeko
Name: Market board
Description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.
Punchline: 어디서든 장터게시판 시세를 확인할 수 있는 플러그인

Author: Sevii
Name: Material UI
Description: Auto updating Material UI with customizable accent color and more. Icon by Meconate
Punchline: Auto updating Material UI with customizable colors.

Author: akira0245, Ori
Name: MidiBard 2
Description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Changelog:
Update after 6.4.
Fixed electric guitar UI issue.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezMiniCactpot
Description: This plugin highlights tiles and lines in MiniCactpot that represent the best potential action you can take.

Author: JayceOfSpades
Name: Mini-Mappingway
Description: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap. Customise the markers and toggle whether you want to see friends, FC members, or both, in the settings! Icon by @Miendoodle on twitter. Thanks nya for the idea!

Author: Marconsou
Name: MP Tick Bar
Description:
-Fast Fire III marker on the bar.
-Autostarts the bar before combat starts.
-Countdown with time offset.
-Compatible with FFXIV Material UI.
Punchline: Visually tracks MP regeneration ticks (Black Mage only).

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MultiHit
Description: Papa asked me for this so here it is.
Punchline: 화면에 뜨는 Flytext를 여러개로 나누어주는 플러그인

Author: aers, JHerig, abashby
Name: Nameplate Debuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on enemy nameplates.

Author: perchbird (originally Meli)
Name: Orchestrion Plugin
Description:
Orchestrion Plugin allows you to change the currently playing in-game BGM. It includes
a curated list of the most accurate in-game song titles, so you know exactly what's playing,
if you want to know later! Add favorite songs to separate them from the rest.
Note: This plugin does not currently allow you to play actual orchestrion songs.

Author: Chirp
Name: Palette+
Punchline: 캐릭터의 머리, 눈, 피부색 등을 변경하는 플러그인
Description: Custom color palettes for FFXIV characters.

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: Pat Me
Description: Did you ever wonder how many times your Lala gets a pat? Well, now you can count it!

Author: Anna
Name: Peeping Tom
Description: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.

Author: Ottermandias, Adam, Wintermute
Name: Penumbra
Description: 모드 적용 및 관리 플러그인

Author: karashiiro
Name: PingPlugin
Description: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.
Punchline: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Pixel Perfect
Description: Showing exactly where to stand since 2020.
Punchline: Reveals your hitbox, with customisable features.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Price Insight
Description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, it will show you the NQ/HQ marketboard prices at the bottom as well as the most recent purchase.
Prices are retrieved from Universalis.app and cached for 90 minutes.
To refresh a price you can tap Alt while hovering over an item.

Author: UnknownX
Name: QoL Bar
Description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.

Author: Anna
Name: Quest Map
Description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Icons: treasure map by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project and
locked book by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project

Author: Infi, PunishedPineapple
Name: Ready Check Helper
Description: Displays the names of the players that were not ready in chat following the completion of a ready check, and optionally adds ready check status icons over the party and alliance lists.

Author: Cair
Name: Redirect
Description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros, sprint, and potions! Type /redirect to configure.
Punchline: Change where your actions are going, queue macros, queue sprint, and queue potions!

Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: RezPls
Description:
Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who,
who is already resurrected,
and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world 
as well as in the group or alliance interface.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Heels
Description: Adjust the position of your character model

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks Plugin
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)

Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. Support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Punchline: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Changelog: See the Sonar Support discord #announcements channel for more information

Author: Infi
Name: Submarine Tracker
Description:
+ Tracker for current builds, routes and times 
+ Builder to improve, solve builds and optimize EXP
+ Configurable notification for return and repairs 
+ Helpy filled useful information
+ Custom loot overview with history and export
+ Multiple overlays to help with daily tasks 
+ Supports multiple FCs

Author: Det
Name: Target Furniture
Description:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you

Author: Pohky
Name: Teleporter
Description:
Adds Chat Commands to Teleport to Aetherytes or Areas by Name.
e.g. /tp Quarrymill or /tpm South Shroud
Supports setting up an Alias for Aetherytes to be used with Teleporter Commands
e.g. /tp home instead of /tp Estate Hall (Free Company)

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Description: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping

Author: Meoiswa
Name: Tilted
Description: 조건에 따라 카메라 각도/거리를 자동으로 조정합니다.

Author: Anna
Name: Tourist
Description:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

Icon: sightseeing by muhammad from the Noun Project

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: TriadBuddy
Description:
Triple triad solver, NPC matches only.
- highlights next move during mini game
- evaluates all deck presets before match
- deck optimizer for NPC
- adds more details to card collection window

Author: ocealot
Name: VFXEditor
Description: VFX, animation, and sound editing plugin. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Dragon
Name: Visibility
Description:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp

Author: Avaflow, NPittinger
Name: Waitingway
Description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as
well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your login queue times to crowdsource information
about FFXIV server load. This information will be publicly available in the future; check the Discord for updates!

Future planned features include login wait time estimates, as well as duty queue time statistics, and a website
showing all of this information.

Discord URL: https://discord.waitingway.com

Author: PunishedPineapple, abashby
Name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Description: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Weatherman
Punchline: 보이는 날씨와 시간을 조절할 수 있는 플러그인

Author: Asgard
Name: XAT
Punchline: 애니메이션과 컷신을 만들고 수정할 수 있는 플러그인
Description: Create and edit animations and cutscenes.

Author: Attick
Name: XIV Combo
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu

Author: daemitus
Name: Yes Already
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Author: daemitus, hiroa
Name: ZodiacBuddy
Description: This plugin attempts to help you complete your Zodiac weapon in various ways.

Author: yomishino
Name: Aether Compass
Description:
This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects
	- [Experimental] Eureka Elementals (by apetih) 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
Punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs

Author: Nagi'to Atreides
Name: Casexile
Description: Lets you use any in-game slash command without worrying about capitalization. Whether you type "/action", "/ACTION", "/AcTiOn" or any variation thereof, the plugin ensures the intended action takes place without wasting your time.

Author: Tischel
Name: DelvCD
Description: DelvCD provides highly customizable UI elements that can be used to track cooldows, status and more with configurable conditions.
Punchline: Customizable UI elements to track cooldowns, status and more.

Author: Marethyu
Name: Where's my mouse
Description:
Add UI element on top of the mouse like circle to keep track of your mouse location during gameplay.
Open settings with /wmm
Punchline: Allows you to not lose track of your mouse on the screen
